CustomField.description: "Default Price in ARR or One-off per unit. Price increase/discount of Sales Price ARR/One-off is assessed agains this field. When the line item is created from... 1) the Renewal Opp, then copy Initial Default Price ARR/One-off field, 2) any of Upsell/Downsell Opp, then copy Sales Price ARR/One-off field, 3) Price Book, then copy List Price * IF(For Renewal, 12, 1) This value can be updated immediately on creation due to the pricing factors applied on Quote creation."
CustomField.label: Default Price ARR/One-off
